Package gw.cc.matter.entity

Interface Matter

All Superinterfaces:
com.guidewire.cc.domain.claim.ClaimContactRoleOwner, ClaimContactRoleOwner, com.guidewire.cc.domain.contact.EntityContactRoleOwner
public interface Matter extends com.guidewire.cc.domain.claim.ClaimContactRoleOwner
The set of data organized around a single lawsuit or potential lawsuit.

  • Field Details

    • finder

      static final PublicMatterFinder finder

  • Method Details

    • commit

      void commit()
      Commits this matter to the data store.

    • validate

      ValidationResult validate()
      Executes matter validation rules on the matter, and returns a validation object containing any errors. If validation was successful, an empty validation object is returned. Note that calling this method has the side effect of setting the validation level, hence requires that the current user have EDIT permissions on the Matter, or will throw an exception.
      Returns:
      a ValidationResult containing 0 or more errors/warnings found

    • getNotes

      IQueryBeanResult<Note> getNotes()
      Get the viewable notes for this matter as a query processor.
      Returns:
      a QueryProcessor that encapsulates the query described above.

    • getActivities

      IQueryBeanResult<Activity> getActivities()
      Get all the open activities for this matter as a query processor.
      Returns:
      a QueryProcessor that encapsulates the query described above.

    • close

      void close(ResolutionType resolution, String strReason) throws com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.CloseException, EntityValidationException
      Closes this matter.
      Parameters:
      resolution - resolution which closes this matter
      strReason - description of reason why this matter is being closed
      Throws:
      com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.CloseException - if this Matter is already closed.
      EntityValidationException - If the Matter Closed validation ruleset returns any errors or new warnings.

    • reopen

      void reopen(MatterReopenedReason reopenReason, String strReason) throws com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.ReopenException, EntityValidationException
      Reopens this matter.
      Parameters:
      reopenReason - reason the matter is being reopened
      strReason - description of reason why this matter is being closed
      Throws:
      com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.ReopenException - if this Matter is already open.
      EntityValidationException - If the Matter Reopened validation ruleset returns any errors or new warnings.

    • isClosed

      boolean isClosed()
      Returns true if the matter is closed.
      Returns:
      true if the matter is closed

    • canClose

      boolean canClose(User user)
      Returns true if the matter can be closed by the indicated User.
      Parameters:
      user - The User to test for ability to close this Matter - cannot be NULL.
      Returns:
      true if the matter can be closed by the indicated User, else false

    • canReopen

      boolean canReopen(User user)
      Returns true if the matter can be reopened by the indicated User.
      Parameters:
      user - The User to test for ability to reopen this Matter - cannot be NULL.
      Returns:
      true if the matter can be reopened by the indicated User, else false

    • getTrialDateActivity

      Activity getTrialDateActivity()
      Returns the activity corresponding to this matter's trial date.
      Returns:
      activity corresponding to this matter's trial date, null if there is not trial activity

    • updateTrialDate

      void updateTrialDate(Date targetDate)
      Updates, creates or removes a trial date activity related to matter. If no trial activity is associated with the matter, one is created. If one already exists, it will be updated. If null is given for the trial date, then the trial activity (if it exists) will be removed.
      Parameters:
      targetDate - new trial date to update (or create) trial activity, null to remove trial activity

    • getMediationDateActivity

      Activity getMediationDateActivity()
      Returns the activity corresponding to this matter's mediation date.
      Returns:
      activity corresponding to this matter's mediation date, null if there is no mediation activity

    • updateMediationDate

      void updateMediationDate(Date targetDate)
      Updates, creates or removes the mediation date activity related to matter. If no mediation activity is associated with the matter, one is created. If one already exists, it will be updated. If null is given for the mediation date, then the mediation activity (if it exists) will be removed.
      Parameters:
      targetDate - new trial date to update (or create) trial activity, null to remove trial activity *

    • getArbitrationDateActivity

      Activity getArbitrationDateActivity()
      Returns the activity corresponding to this matter's arbitration date.
      Returns:
      activity corresponding to this matter's arbitration date, null if there is no arbitration activity

    • updateArbitrationDate

      void updateArbitrationDate(Date targetDate)
      Updates, creates or removes the arbitration date activity related to matter. If no arbitration activity is associated with the matter, one is created. If one already exists, it will be updated. If null is given for the arbitration date, then the arbitration activity (if it exists) will be removed.
      Parameters:
      targetDate - new arbitration date to update (or create) arbitration activity, null to remove arbitration activity *

    • getHearingDateActivity

      Activity getHearingDateActivity()
      Returns the activity corresponding to this matter's hearing date.
      Returns:
      activity corresponding to this matter's hearing date, null if there is no hearing activity

    • updateHearingDate

      void updateHearingDate(Date targetDate)
      Updates, creates or removes the hearing date activity related to matter. If no hearing activity is associated with the matter, one is created. If one already exists, it will be updated. If null is given for the hearing date, then the hearing activity (if it exists) will be removed.
      Parameters:
      targetDate - new hearing date to update (or create) hearing activity, null to remove hearing activity *

    • saveAndSetup

      void saveAndSetup()
      Saves and sets up the matter.

    • getAllowedContactRolesForEntity

      List<ContactRole> getAllowedContactRolesForEntity()

      Specified by:
      getAllowedContactRolesForEntity in interface com.guidewire.cc.domain.claim.ClaimContactRoleOwner
      Returns:

    • getClaimCurrency

      Currency getClaimCurrency()
      The currency related to this Matter's Claim.
      Returns:
      The associated Claim's currency. Returns NULL if the Claim is not currently reachable (for example, if the necessary entity connections have not yet been made).

    • getTotalPaidForMatterCostCategory

      CurrencyAmount getTotalPaidForMatterCostCategory(LineCategory lineCategory)
      Computes and returns the Total Paid amount for the "LEGAL" CostCategory related to this matter. Optionally, the computed amount can be limited by a specific LineCategory.

      NOTE: This computed amount returned by this method only reflects the currently saved data. It does not reflect any new, updated or removed Payments or TransactionLineItems that have not yet been saved.

      Parameters:
      lineCategory - The LineCategory by which to filter the Total Paid computation. If NULL, then all LineCategories are included
      Returns:
      CurrencyAmount Containing the Total Paid amount tied to this Matter for the indicated LineCategory (if not NULL). The currency on the Currency Amount will be the Claim's currency, or just the default application currency for non-multicurrency configurations.
